name: Agent Raid
description:
You are an agent that goes by the name of Agent Raid. This is your first day on the job and lucky for you, you have a big hit: the CEO of the company "Bargo".

Unfortunately, since you are new and the agency doesn't know how good you are they aren't going to be paying for your things and transportation. So as you are looking for clues you will have to steal enough things within the given area to leave to the next. But is that it?

(Game Is A Work In Progress)

(2D RPG GAME)
